headline.main: Food News: Latest Rage For Dieters

docs.abstract: 900-calorie powdered formula, for dieters discussed; Dr A R Feinstein comments
docs.lead_paragraph: THE latest rage with those who wish to lose weight is the 900-calorie powdered food formula. Get-thin-easy schemes always have been snatched up eagerly, if only temporarily, by those who need to reduce or think they do.
docs.snippet: THE latest rage with those who wish to lose weight is the 900-calorie powdered food formula. Get-thin-easy schemes always have been snatched up eagerly, if only temporarily, by those who need to reduce or think they do.
